entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
